official-title.#text: To provide student loan forgiveness for American Indian educators teaching in local educational agencies with a high percentage of American Indian students.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

committee-name.#text: Committee on Education and the Workforce

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: American Indian Teacher Loan Forgiveness Act of 2014
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: American Indian Teacher Loan Forgiveness Act of 2014

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text: Student loan forgiveness for American Indian educators teaching in local educational agencies with a high percentage of American Indian students

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: is amended by adding at the end the following:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Section 428J(c) of the Higher Education Act of 1965

header.#text: American Indian teachers in local educational agencies with a high percentage of American Indian students

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall repay under this section shall be not more than $17,500 in the case of a borrower who—
